Articles.Content: Considering that I already have Lazer Eyes, the lazer had no effect on me. I punch the next poster in the face while moving passed them in a space ship moving at 15 kilometers per second.
I take the punch and go flying in to the next poster.
I am still in the space ship, so I am going faster then you. While I am enjoying my success, I crash into the next poster.

You missed me by 1760 yards (1 mile).

The debris then crashed toward the next poster.
Some nano-genes appear and cure me, but they accidentaly modify human DNA by trying to cure a dead guy with a gas mask, and it starts spreading, hitting the next poster.

My immune system destroys the viruses.

The undead (un-dead person in a mask) then walks toward the next poster.

Walks. I fly.

The undead forgets about me, then acquires a jetpack and flies towards the next poster.

He has no working brain and destroy himself instead, thus ending the apocalypse.

I launch a rocket toward the next poster.

It runs out of fuel and putters to a stop inches from my face.

I refuel the rocket and shoot it at the next poster.

It runs on H2/O2 while you refueled it with RP-1/O2, so it won't run.

The rocket then falls toward the next poster.

I use laser weaponry to pulverise the rocket.

Use it on the next poster.
*uses hand mirror to deflect laser toward next poster*
Well I got a Red Hot Nickel Ball cannon with a homemade Hydrogen ,and Oxygen blow torch.Including a party artillery to provide maximum partiness at death.

I math my way out of the predicament!!!

I tie the next poster to a chair and force them to attend a math lecture.

Well guess what I can handle such lecture.

I attack the next poster with a giant steam powered robot.

I deploy a liquid nitrogen cannon to freeze the robot's steam source.

I then call in a kinetic energy " Rods from God" strike from a suitably modified sub-launched ballistic missile. Impact velocity: Mach 12. Mass: 1 ton.

Next poster better run fast. It's GPS guided.

I have previously knocked a GPS satellite out of alignment when I whizzed passed it on my way to Duna, so the suitably modified sub-launched ballistic missile lands off target, right on top of the next poster.

The lander's legs are too long, and it missed me by 25 feet.

The lander then abruptly throttle up, flying toward the next poster.
I employ an SM-3 ASAT/ABM missile to intercept the lander, turning it into a burning fireball of shrapnel and debris that heads towards the next poster.

Shrapnel and debris! My favorite midnight snack! *proceeds to eat all shrapnel and debris*

Here's a cookie for the next poster! *throws cookie-shaped ninja star at next poster*

Oh come on... *dodge* Really? As cool as they seem to be, they're not that effective.

*pulls out a colt M1911*

THIS is more effective.

*shoots next poster in the head*

The bullet pings off my bullet proof helmet.

I set my brother on the next poster.

He wasn't heavy, and I set him on the sofa.

Then he ran toward the next poster for no reason...

No brother. No. No! NO! NONONONONONO! NO! Bad brother! Bad! Now go and do something else.

Hmmm... I hire a Vogon to read poetry at the next poster.

Hehe. I use noise cancelling headphones.

I toss a canister of antimatter at the next poster. By the way, containment failure is imminent. Have fun.
